title: Financial Basics
description: Simple lessons on saving, bank accounts, and receiving benefits safely.

lessons.title: Why Saving Helps
lessons.content: Saving even small amounts regularly helps during emergencies like illness, crop loss, or school fees. Keeping money in a bank is safer than cash at home.

quiz.question: Where is it safer to keep savings?

lessons.title: Bank Account and DBT
lessons.content: Government benefits often come through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) to your bank account. Keep your Aadhaar and bank details updated.
